Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Great, stylish product for the price
Review_Text:
Nice fan speeds and looks great (and no damage from shipping either).

It is slightly weighty, so the installers had to put in stud to mount it.  The convertible feature was greatly appreciated - initially I wanted to put it in recirculate mode in order to facilitate an easy install, but changed my mind mid-construction and went for a vented install.  Good thing this vent hood allowed that option.

Only have it in for two weeks now, but simple things like easily removable baffles and an interior oil catch pan is useful to have.

While install is relatively straight forward, make sure the molex-style electric connectors are tight if you have problems with the lights - installers left one loose and one bulb wasn't working.  Simple and easy adjustment even after the vent hood was mounted to the wall.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: This item is great if you can't vent it as they can be ...
Review_Text: I've now bought 2 of these. Very high end looking only problem is the lights don't come on anymore on the fist one. I don't know if they both burned out at the same time or if something else is wrong. I haven't replaced the lights yet. This item is great if you can't vent it as they can be used with charcoal filters.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: works great but the controls are not very straight forward

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Caveat emptor--due diligence may not be enough
Review_Text:
I did my due diligence when I ordered this hood; I called the company n Ohio and asked if the hood/chimney cover would work for the 9ft ceiling in my kitchen and the rep said yes. (I did not budget for the extra $100 chimney cover for higher ceilings.)  Someone also left a comment saying it would, so I felt fine ordering it. When my contractor installed it according to the manufacturer's instructions, the chimney hood was two inches short, meaning the pipe underneath is now exposed.  Page 4 of the manual reads, "THE HOOD SHALL BE NSTALLED AT 28" MINIMUM to 36" ABOVE THE COUNTERTOPS."  My countertops are standard height, and the contractor installed the hood at exactly 28 inches.  When I called to explain the problem, I was sent a short piece of chimney cover, the a half-size duplicate of what I already have and our contractor can't make it work because of the design. I called back and the rep gave me the runaround and told that I misunderstood the manual. And that nobody has ever had this problem before. And that all houses are different, so I should try to understand.

I asked for a longer chimney cover to be sent so that I can install what I paid for, a hood and chimney cover to fit a 9 ft. ceiling,, but they want me to pay $100+ for the longer hood.  I explained that this is a bait-and-switch technique that I am very uncomfortable with.  I asked for an answer by the end of today, and, not surprisingly, they have not returned my call.

The moral of this story:  if you have a nine foot ceiling, know that you may have to pay an extra hundred for this unit to fit it if you install it at 28".  I now have to pay my subcontractor to take it all down, and install it two inches higher if I decide to keep it. Very aggravating, because now we will be looking at the bottom of the hood rather than the hood itself when we stand in the kitchen.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: This hood gives us that plus it is very nice looking.
Review_Text: I've yet to install this unit in our new home but did plug it in to determine the noise level. We wanted a hood with above average exhaust power yet quiet. This hood gives us that plus it is very nice looking.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: We purchased this vent hood during a kitchen remodel project in December 2013. We researched for some time before deciding on the ZLine ZLKB36. We could not have made a better choice. The vent has a classic and modern look, without any quirky or weird looking design features. It looks absolutely beautiful, and works like a champ! It is solidly built, and has the look and feel of quality. It looks like it cost far more than we spent. I see that the price has gone up $20 since we bought ours, but I would say that at $100 more it is still worth it. This unit compares favorably or better than some very expensive range hoods. We have our vent installed over a 36" cooktop, and it really sucks--the steam/odors right out of the room. It is reasonably quiet, even on the highest setting. Installation was easy, but we had to have a HVAC guy reroute our exhaust because our old one was too close to the kitchen window (our code says at least 3' away from the nearest window). We ended up running our exhaust line through the roof, which worked out great. We like everything about our range hood--the look, the price, the beautiful lighting, it works amazingly well, and it is easy to clean. I especially like the 3 minute timer shut-off feature. When you are done cooking and your cooktop/pots/pans are still hot, you hit the timer button while you sit down to dinner. 3 minutes later, the vent and lights shut off automatically. UPDATE 11/2016: We use our range hood daily, and it continues to work perfectly and look beautiful. We finally had one of the halogen bulbs burn out. I noticed that the new models come with LED bulbs, so I ordered an LED replacement. Here is the link: Bonlux 2W MR11 GU4.0 LED Bulbs 10-30V AC/DC 120 Degree Beam Angle LED G4/GU4 Bi-pin Base 20W Halogen Bulbs Equivalent MR11 Spotlight Warm White for Landscape Accent Recessed Track Lighting (Pack of 2) Also, a tip I learned for cleaning the hood is to use a little vegetable oil on a rag. This gets all the sticky dust off, and does not leave any streaks like glass or stainless steel cleaners.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: looks great!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Installed easily and is beautiful in our kitchen.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
We chose this range hood for our remodel because we liked the simple clean look, and we were not installing any upper cabinets, so we needed the chimney.

Pros:
Looks awesome. Other brands that look this great start at twice the price.
Moves a huge amount of air! Even on "1" I can feel a breeze behind me coming in the open window across the kitchen.
The lights underneath are great - perfect level of brightness, and they can swivel. We often use them as a quieter "mood" light when the main kitchen lights are off.
There is an easy 3 minute timer: When the fan is running, the first time the power button is pressed it starts the timer, or press again to turn the power off immediately.
Installation was easy enough, and I was able to DIY it. We added a 2x6 between the wall studs to hold the weight.

Cons: (note we kept this hood in the box for months before installing it so didn't follow up with seller about exchanging it)
2nd rate construction. The back is spot welded, which caused part of the back panel to warp, and one of the welds was broken on arrival. The front of the chimney has a 1 inch scratch on it, which we didn't see until after installing and peeling off the white protective coating.
The right side arrived with a pushed in area... not sure if this was a warp from welding heat, or a dent. At any rate I was able to push it most of the way back to flat from the inside, and it faces the corner of the kitchen so won't be visible unless I point it out.
The hood is off level, or warped somehow. I used a level to mount the hood level to the wall at the back, but the front is not the same level. The front right corner is lower than the other three. I have tried to muscle the front back to level, but that's hard to do once it's installed. I'm worried if I push further it will warp the top of the hood. We've got it close enough, but not perfect.

All in all, we are happy, and we may be able to buff or grind out the scratch somehow. We love the look and performance, and we hope it keeps going for years. If the construction quality was better supervised this would be an amazing value.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Looks great.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Installed very easy and it looks great in our kitchen

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Nice product. It's working very well so far
Review_Text:
Nice product. It's working very well so far. Very fast delivery.....High recommended
Cons: I don't like the plastic tube. I broke it during installed.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Nice vent, I would probably buy it again...

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Install Easy, works great.  Had a problem with the power button sticking.  Called the company and they sent one out right away.  Easy fix.  Looks awesome.  Compared to our old fan, well you cant compare, this one is perfect.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Put this item into a house I am remodeling for sale.  It looks very nice and sophisticated.  the controls are easy to learn and I appreciate I didn't have to be a genius to install it.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: We were sent a ZLKL30B not the 48" we ordered and paid for, now we understand that they are out of 48" and completion of our church's kitchen is now on hold for who knows how long. THis was our 1st experience with Amazon and it wasn't a very good one

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: DON'T HESITATE TO PURCHASE BIG-TICKET ITEMS. AMAZON SERVICE IS GREAT.
Review_Text:
I live by a simple rule when shopping: "If the store display doesn't survive, don't buy it."
I took a giant leap of faith by purchasing this range hood without seeing this exact model in a store. In a kitchen with a 36" gas cooktop and no upper cabinets, the hood must perform and look great too. EXCELLENT PRODUCT. Half the price of the nearly identical hoods I saw in stores.  It's solid, beautiful,  has amazing air flow and is conversation-quiet on all but the highest setting which produces a sensible draft in the kitchen doorway.
About service: Shipping damage due to failed packaging of the first hood. The damaged hood was retrieved and a new one on the way within one business day. The new one arrived within two business days of the initial report. GREAT SERVICE.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: We installed this hood under a cabinet.  I wanted something with a low profile and the motor fit inside the cabinet.  It is much more quiet than our previous hood that had less power.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
Great product!!! Easy installation!!!!
I ordered this product and it looks great installed. The delivery was a breeze. I recommend Z Line products.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: We've had this range hood for a little over a year now.  Our only disappoint was that we couldn't install it to vent outdoors in our kitchen, so we used the carbon filters.  These were originally left out of our first shipment, but customer service was quick to send them out.  One of the lights would flicker a bunch, but it turned out it just had a loose plug wire when I took off the screen to look.  Its super loud on medium (3) to full (5) power, but that's to be expected.  We're very happy with this hood.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: We bought this for our kitchen renovation. It is a great price and looks fantastic. The jury is still out on how well it works. It makes a lot of noise and I really can't tell if it is taking out smells when it is on.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
Great product looks great over the stove and you can not beat the price.  I would recommend to anyone
 thanks

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Returned three that were defective or damaged. Really disappointed.
Review_Text:
I had an issue receiving one of these vents that was not damaged or defective. I returned three of them back to Amazon before giving up. The way the product is packaged is really shoddy. Each package was also packaged a little differently.

The first one I ordered and received had an electrical problem. The light was randomly turning on and off after it was installed on my wall and the light button was getting stuck, so I returned it for a replacement. The second one I received had a damaged fan blade so when the blower was turned on it made a horrible noise. I sent that one back as well for a replacement (I'm an optimistic person.). I was hoping to receive one that wasn't defective, however I disappointingly received one that was damaged. There was a huge dent in the side. I didn't bother testing it to see if it was defective.

I feel like I've wasted a lot of time and energy with this whole ordeal. I really question the quality of this product even though it looks nice. The price seems a little too good to be true. The company needs better quality assurance/checking. I'll be buying a hood vent somewhere else.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
The hood did not work when it was installed.  I called customer service to solve the problem and was even less impressed with their customer nonservice.  I was basically accused of not telling the truth as if I had done something to the hood as why it would not work.  I did not install the hood immediately as I am a 64 year old female and could not remove the hood from the box by myself so waited for installation by my HVAC man. When my HVAC man came out to install the hood it, approximately 30 days after it was delivered, the hood would not turn on. Therefore, the call to customer nonservice.  After begging and pleading with the nonservice rep, she agreed to send a new circuit board (which solved the problem.)
There are four levels for the fan.  Any level beyond 2 becomes noisy and 3 and 4 is extremely noisy - noisy so you can't speak without raising your voice.
I understand the hood is not made in America as indicated.  That is one of the reasons I purchased the hood - Made in America.  I would not recommend this hood to anyone.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
I read a review that said the air flow was weak, but I can say that mine is quite powerful.

There were no frustrations or disappointments in the install.  Everything that was needed was included.  The directions were adequate.

The unit looks and functions very nice.

I'm not sure if it is clear in the product description, but the chimney is only tall enough for 8' ceilings.  It is about 4" too short for my 9' ceiling.  Since I vented it through the wall I probably won't bother with getting an extension to take it all the way to the ceiling.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: It looks beautiful when installed.  My wife and I love it and it is not as loud as our old hood.  It does come with 6 inch plastic duct but I easily replaced it with a aluminum expandable duct.  We haven't yet used it in high intense cooking so we will see if it takes the smells away.  We were worried how the lights will look in the back, however, we like that fact that it pivits and it looks great against our stone backsplash.  We would highly recomend this product for the money.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: We just finished installing it last week, and have been using it. It is quite strong and study. My wife likes to keep it at fan level 2 or 3. It is not very quite, but that's expected as long as it does its job. So far so good.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
This has a great industrial look and goes very well with our concrete countertops and stainless appliances.

Fans are powerful and I like the simple design.

The fan covers do vibrate sometimes and I have to tap them to release whatever tension is causing the vibration. Easy install, great look, I would definitely buy the same unit again.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
This range hood performs better than expected given it's price. The squirrel cage fan is relatively quiet given the amount of air it moves. The lighting is very adequate and the removable filters are easy to clean in the dishwasher.

I did have a minor quality problem with the cowling that encloses the fan and motor assembly - the side panel rubbed against the turning axle which I remedied by inserting a spacer-washer between it and the cowling. I would advise testing the fan before mounting the unit to the wall.

Despite this issue, I would buy the unit again - for the price, it's a great performer and is styled well - it looks great!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: No way this is more than around 200 cfm
Review_Text: I thought the description was too good to be true, and I was right. Shame on me. Mounting was straightforward and easy, and it is fairly heavy gauge stainless, but I have to remove the filters to get it to pull anything closely resembling enough air to get the most basic ventilation, and I have it vented directly outside through the wall at the top of the hood, with only one elbow.. Save your money and don't buy this piece of junk.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: A must for any kitchen remodel.
Review_Text: Great piece for any kitchen. Easy to install and gives a great look to my kitchen. Packed well and works great.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Original review would have been 3 stars because the was in great shape, but one of the lights went out after installation.  Amazing was great during the return process as always and sent us a band new unit before we even sent back the other one.  This is one of the many reasons I continue to use amazon because of their customer service!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Love the simple elegant look.  The fan is quiet and strong with multiple speeds.  LOVE the perfectly placed bright lights... Def 5 star

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Easy to install. Looks Great. Good value. Noisey.
Review_Text: The ZLINE ZLKB 48" was very easy to install.  It looks great, and so far so good (we've had it for a week). Downsides are few. The fan is much noisier than advertised, ie it's billed as very quiet, and, although they give you the sound level in sones (assuming you what each level means, I don't), it is NOT very quiet. 2)The mounting screws that it comes with should be upgraded. 3) is more of a personal preference/oversight on my part..I thought that the directional lights were LED, but they're halogen (energy waster), but they light well and frankly look pretty cool.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Great bang for the buck! A nice 36 inch for the price of a 30 inch. Great fan, quality components. I'm impressed.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Wow we're were so excited after a lot of research to find this well priced vent. Only to have a major disappointment when it arrive damaged. Not only was the carton badly damaged but it looked like it had been opened and returned by. Others.  A look on the inside showed many scrapes through the protective wrap on the vent. We sensed nothing but problems and sent it back ASAP.  Amazon ordering /returning went smoothly.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
Pros:  Low price.  Great looks.  Nice lights.  Good fan features (auto shutoff).  Easy to install.

Cons:  No power and loud.  The motor sounds as loud as a wet vac, but the max flowrate is nowhere near 760 CFM.  Since there's no regulatory organization that certifies how manufacturers test their airflow claims, it's hard to compare one fan to another based on these specs alone.  This hood is definitely not 760 CFM.  I can't measure it, but it's very similar to an old hood from my old apartment which was pretty basic.  That one would be one of those cheapo models from Home Depot and might be rated around 200 CFM.

So, if you want this for looks, get it.  Great value.  If you want this hood for ventilation, don't waste your money here.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Recommend this range hood to any do-it-yourself installer.  A major improvement over what we had before.  Excellent addition to our kitchen.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Cheap material and bad lighting location
Review_Text:
The material is cheap made but what you pay and what you get. The lighting is set on inside. It is not bright enough  using outside cook set even you can tilt the light. Ignore us okay for the price but definitely nope for high end kitchen.
Update:
I own this for 5 years and it has no issue so far. Love it.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: We could not be happier with this item. It functions very well. Very easy to install and I would recommend this to any homeowner.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Decent range hood for the price
Review_Text: We have been happy so far. The edges of the baffle filters are very sharp and I've cut my hands multiple times when I took them out to clean.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Fabulous Find for my new kitchen
Review_Text: I was a bit unsure of the look of this product since I ordered it online and the price was so very reasonable. Turns out, it looks just fabulous. More than I expected. I had trouble with the lighting but called the company and they sent me a replacement lighting kit and it works better than ever. I would absolutely recommend this product.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
This really made our new kitchen look professional.  It sits over a 36 inch range.  Realistically, a 36 inch hood should probably sit over a smaller range so that the fans encompass the entire range surface.  That's just something to keep in mind when you're planning your kitchen layout.

It is a bit loud even on the lowest setting.  It's not jarringly loud, but it's enough that people will need to speak up when it's on.  On higher settings it really does suck up vapors well.

I know some people thought the illumination from the two lights was not enough, but I found it acceptable.  I can see it being a problem if those two lights were your only source of lighting, but who works in a kitchen like that?  Save the mood lighting for eating dinner, not preparing it.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Works great. Perfect for our kitchen and with the charcoal filters(seperate ) you don't need to vent. Wouldn'tt hesitate to recommend to anyone

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Draws well and not too loud.
Review_Text:
I installed this in a remodel I was doing for my self.  Hanging the hood was straight forward and I was able to adapt the stack because of a tricky situation not related to the hood.  Looks nice and understated.  I would like it a little stiffer as I use the flat top to keep frequently used ingredients close at hand.

It is not a very quiet vent but the levels are in keeping with others I have seen and it does suck the smoke nicely out of my small kitchen.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
Form:

Looks good, buttons and display are decent. Halogen lights are nice, they articulate. Material of the hood are good, grease filters on the other hand are very flimsy, easy to bend by hand. In fact one of the grease filter handles arrived bent, I easily bent it back. If you are gentle with them they should last ok. You typically don't wash them with a power washer anyway.

Function:

Fan seems powerful... maybe beacuse its not balanced well. The unit does vibrate a little bit, no one notices but me, I tend to be over critical. I have the hood secured to studs so I was able to get a snug fit. It is loud, unfortunatley that is a subjective. I find it fine because when its in use its only in use for short amount of times. I don't recall the height I mounted it, I'm 5"11 and its mounted so i cannot bump my head on it. At that height it pulls all smoke from searing meats and fumes out of the kitchen on level 2 or 3.

For the price its a winner. Can't speak to reliablity yet.
.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: So far this has worked very well. The clients like it. The draw is performing as intended to remove cooking odors. The look and finish is quite nice. I will order this again if I need one for a remodel.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Cheap price for a great product.
Review_Text: Like a lot of others, I was skeptical at first due to the relative cheap price of this hood compared to most others, however the great reviews convinced me and I'm thrilled we went with this one. I cannot imagine how a hood could have been easier to install, it's very powerful, it's quite a bit quieter then I was expecting, it looks good. The only issue we've noticed is the one vent will occasionally have a slight rattle when we're using it, we've isolated it to where we know it's in the little tab that you slide back in order to drop the vent for cleaning. As soon as you put your finger on it it stops so I'm confident either simply tightening it up or using some sort of dampening material under that corner will take care of that.  We've only been using it in our kitchen for a few weeks so I can't talk about durability but everything else has met or exceeded my expectations.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: I cannot speak highly enough about this range hood and the customer service I received from the company. The box arrived totally undamaged in just 24 hours but there was a small piece broken in the plastic housing. I took a picture, emailed it to the company, and received a reply and replacement part in just 24 hours, no questions asked. Today you don't receive that kind of service very often from any retailer let alone online! This installed with ease and is far superior for the price than anything I found at local hardware and appliance stores. The fan speeds are terrific and lighting is perfect!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Affordable hood backed by a great company!
Review_Text:
We love this range hood and even more, we love Z-line! We have had trouble with the light bulbs in the unit but they are always so nice and send out the new parts that we need.

I truly believe that how you deal with problems is a true reflection of a company and this one is top-notch.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: good product for the money. moves  a lot of air with out too much noise. I would buy it  again.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: I'd buy another one (I plan to, actually)
Review_Text: As some people said, the steam/smoke goes through the lights in the back more than it goes through the vent slits in the front, but it has not appeared to be an issue with its functionality. It is very stylish and not too loud for the amount of air it moves. Overall, I am pretty happy with the purchase.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: So awesome and easy to use.  If you have tall ceilings, be ready for an expensive install, but really a terrific appliance.  My came bent and I'm still giving five stars, because I love it so much.  The bent part can't be seen with how it's currently positioned and installed.  Anyway, this has some serious sucking power.  Plus, the lighting is terrific.  I read other reviewers say its not, but in my opinion it has great lighting.  If you don't have under cabinet lighting, I guess I could see how they might think the lighting was insufficient.  I hope it lasts.  Been using it for 2 months.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: This product was everything it said it was.  Quiet running, nice lighting, looks and works great. We get tons of compliments on it an the price here was much less expensive than we were finding in appliance and "super" stores-Highly recommend.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: We love the hood. It looks great in our remodeled kitchen. Quick free delivery. Must be installed with patience. First time, we had a little trouble, but solved the problem easily. Love it! Very modern.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
SO FAR SO GOOD, IT SEEMS POWERFUL ENOUGH TO GET THE JOB DONE. WE HAVE ONLY USED IT A FEW TIMES, BUT IT SEEMS TO BE WORKING WELL. RELATIVELY EASY TO INSTALL, EASY TO FOLLOW DIRECTIONS. THE ONLY DOWNFALL WE HAVE FOUND IS THAT WE FORGET TO USE IT SOMETIMES, WE HAVE NEVER HAD ONE BEFORE THIS...
THANKS TO EVERYONE INVOLVED

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Best hood I could find anywhere for the price.
Review_Text: This hood is better than the range hoods Home Depot and Lowes had, and a heck of a lot cheaper. I couldn't find a comparable stainless steel range hood for any where near the price. Easy to install also. I installed it myself in about an hour.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: We have not installed the hood as our home is still under construction, but we've tested it out of the box and it seems to be very good. What we were very impressed with is that it was delivered within 3 days, and packed very well. The quality is excellent, and price is far better than any comparable hood. We will see how it goes after install, but so far I would highly recommend.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Excelent product and fast delivery from Amazon. Hood is really cool,  a bit loud at maximum but has a neat lights and fan is powerful.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: for 300$ this is the best u can get for the price point, if product was more expensive it would be considered thin and flimsy

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
It arrived in perfect condition and worked as it should. Installation was fairly simple. The lights are bright enough and the fan is very powerful without being too loud. Only suggestions are to make the upper bracket bigger and with some adjustment ( I did have to customize it slightly to get the screw holes to line up) they also could leave more room for the lights to tilt without hitting the control panel inside the hood.
Overall very happy- works well and looks good - much less expensive than others we found

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: We purchased this for our kitchen remodel hesitant because it was so much less than the competition.  WE love it, get so many compliments on it!  Was easy to install and runs quitely.  Would recommend!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Looks expensive and gives the kitchen a professional look...  Average performance for money spent. The buttons and controls are cheaply made.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: We have a new home we just built and put this in.  It's VERY nice and looks wonderful!  It's beyond me why anyone would pay more for something like this that looks the way it does.  It has great lighting and some serious suction!  Works great!  I'd definitely recommend over and over again!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Instructions were very clear - it was easier than we thought it would be.  Looks like it could have cost 5 times as much. The lights are a great strength & the fans' many options were a surprise !!  Very pleased that I took a chance on this product!!  Great shipping & arrived fast!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: This fan is a good buy for the money. Well built?  Mismatched screws, loose wiring and poor instructions. The SS is heavy duty and looks teriffic installed.  It's a bit noisy but clears the smoke out without difficulty on a setting of 3 or above. This is for intense smoke from grilling steaks on gas grill top. On the lower settings it does a good job for normal everyday cooking.  Installation is simple but I would not recommend using the supplied hardware or plastic flex vent pipe.  You should also place blocking behind the fan to attach securely to the wall. Spend a few extra dollars and get quality hardware.  There is no way you will get a fan of this quality for this price, shipping included even with the addded extra expense of better hardware. If you have a tall ceiling the extra lengths of SS covering can get expensive.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Item arrived as described. The installation was straight forward. The unit is powerful and we will see how the ventless, charcoal inserts work - not in long enough to comment on performance

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Hood came very quickly! It is excellent! Love that the lights under the hood can be rotated to shine on an eye directly.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: My kitchen is completely usable yet so can give this 5 starts yet...but...love the look and seems to pull exhaust well. Lights nice-bright and adjustable.  Fans great and quiet (as far as exhaust fans go). Definitely recommend and excellent value and quality.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: I ordered a island hood and they shipped a wall mount of the same thing.  I had no time to send back and get another so had to go buy one at a store paying 300 percent more money.  So much for saving money on the internet.  They cost me an extra $600 and haven't even offered an apology.  Also, the unit came without the manual.  I saw other reviews saying that no manual or installation instructions were in the box and apparently the company has not learned from its mistakes yet.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: great sleak look, east install, many fan speeds
Review_Text:
My wife and I picked this up for our new kitchen.  It looks incredible and retail (in stores) this is much more pricey.
The lights are great, the fan settings are also excellent.
Installed fairly easily as well

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: better than expected quality and reasonably quiet - unbeatable value
Review_Text: The gauge of material and quality of construction are better than I expected for such a relatively low price...for a 36" range hood in this style. The unit arrived securely packed with 6" ducting and an instruction book. I was definitely pleased to hear the unit run - not much more than the sound of moving air, and at higher settings...it moves a LOT of air! In a word > Value... unbeatable value.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Very nice.  Looks sturdy and appears of high quality.  Have received several compliments on it.  Would definitely recommend this range hood.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Looks great, it was easy to install and performs as expected.
Review_Text: Looks great, it was easy to install and performs as expected. It came well packaged and it was complete. The quality is very good and we love how it looks in our kitchen.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: u get what u pay for
Review_Text: when both lights went out, I thought it was odd, so I removed the vent baffles to see if there was a problem. the wiring leading to the lights was black and burned. now I need to hire an electrician to see what needs to be replaced and at what cost. I guess there is a reason it is the lowest priced hood.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: lighting wiring burned up in under a year
Review_Text: when both lights went out, I thought it was odd, so I removed the vent baffles to see if there was a problem. the wiring leading to the lights was black and burned. now I need to hire an electrician to see what needs to be replaced and at what cost. I guess there is a reason it is the lowest priced hood.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: The unit came in on time and looked as expected.  Installation fairly easy but a bit more direction around direct wire vs. plug in would have been helpful.  The design includes a small frame that the top of the chimney attaches to for support.  on a fully extended chimney working over the stove, very difficult to hit feed the mini screws through the chimney and into the frame holes.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: This hood is great, especially for the price.  I have been using it for a week and it works perfectly.  Note that if your ceiling is more than 8 feet you will need an extension.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Wow!  Excellent Price, Quick shipment and above all outstanding customer service!
Review_Text:
I looked around quite a bit for a 36" stainless steel hood for our new home and comparable hoods were $1,000 - $2,000 range.  I was initially bit skeptical since price was so good and was not sure if this hood will work with our 9' ceiling.  I was happy to get quick answer from Laureen that it should be fine for 9' ceilings and I placed the order.  Item was delivered within 3-4 days.

We just moved into the house and noticed that the lights on the hood did not work, fan worked just fine.  I wasn't sure what to do since I had purchased the product over a month ago - but decided to send an email to the vendor to see if they can provide me with any pointers.  I was really impressed to receive the email from Laureen within minutes telling me she had already put replacement transformer in the mail for me and in the mean time I can check for any loose connections.  My lights are now working fine after replacing the new transformer.  The product looks great and working good for last 2 weeks that we have been using.

I will definitely do business with this vendor.  Things happen, but, how they addressed the issue was amazing in my opinion.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: this product worked for my project. it has a square edge. this made it easy to enclose with a custom built cover. controls are on the front and does not interfere with the encloser. cheaper than buying a range for custom built covers.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: I ordered the wrong size, they shipped me the right one...no questions asked, at my door in a few days.
Review_Text:
The product itself is fine, it looks good, and it does the job.
For the price, it's a great deal.

The company is a pleasure to do business with.  When I realized I'd ordered the wrong one I panicked and wondered how much it would cost me to get the right one.  Not a dime.  I called them and they asked me to ship it back to them and even gave me the shipping label to do so. In a few days I had the correct size hood at my door.  I would recommend them and buy from them again.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: The Z Line 36" Stainless Pro Series is all one needs to give their kitchen an updated look.  High end quality on an affordable budget!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: It is perfect!  We put a steel backdrop behind it in the kitchen.  I have already begun receiving so many compliments from friends and family about it's beauty.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Beautiful hood, makes kitchen look great
Review_Text:
I originally received a damaged hood and the seller responded to my email within a day and had it picked up and sent out a new one pronto, so the customer service is excellent. The second hood I received was perfect.

We installed it and it looks fantastic. It looks much more expensive than it was (easily as nice as the $1,500 hoods at Home Depot and Lowe's) and works like a charm. It's not that quiet, but not overly loud, either, even on high. Pretty much a noise level that you'd expect from any hood. I highly recommend this hood.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: The price and quality was awesome!  I was concerned what I would be getting for $299, but it looks wonderful in our kitchen and qualify is far from cheap.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Very good and priced nice. It was simple to install. I did replace the provided plastic vent pipe with an aluminum one. But I was then able to put the plastic pipe for use later elsewhere.. The timer feature is great.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
So, we wanted a good looking chimney style vent hood that did not break the bank to replace our over the range micro which was completely useless for removing cooking smoke and grease. 640 CFMs for less than $300? Decent reviews on Amazon?  Sold! Are the rest of you reviewers paid by ZLine? Because this is the biggest piece of garbage, waste of money that I have ever invested in. Saying a lot, I know, but read on...

For the price, I did not expect this to be on par with a Ventahood, or even a lower end Broan, but I *did* expect it to function, at least minimally. Word to the wise: you get what you pay for with this one. Had it not been too late to return this item without a hefty $100 shipping fee by the time our kitchen remodel was almost complete and we were ready to install, this would have gone right back. Unfortunately, we found that there is zero useful information on the company website, much less a human to talk to. Just try to find any information on the ZLine website, and you will see that this is a shoddy company---no useful contact info, product info, etc. Cruddy piece of garbage made in China, although the company as listed in Ohio. . The back story, for those who are interested in details:

The product arrived missing a critical piece (back piece for holding the chimney sleeve), but the vendor replaced right away. So far, so good. Then the problems began...

First, one of the halogen bulbs was DOA. After reviewing the cr@ppy installation manual, which listed the page for replacement incorrectly as page 23, but alas, is actually on page 25  (seriously? They can't bother to proofread the instructions?), I set about replacing the bulb. Had I actually attempted to follow the instructions provided (again, on the wrong page) , complete with inaccurate and completely indecipherable instructions and diagram, I would have broken the not only the entire bulb, but its housing assembly. Luckily, I'm fairly handy and not a complete moron (well, except for purchasing this thing:). The holes for the light bulb were honed incorrectly, uneven and nearly impossible to get a bulb in, but after working gently on it for a while, I eventually got it to work. Still, this process took much longer than it should have, and frankly, I should not have been forced to deal with it right out of the gate.

Fast forward to installation a few weeks later: terrible diagrams and instructions, yet again. Our contractor got the main body up with just a few annoying issues. Then, however, the problems started again. Included with the vent hood is a plastic flexible duct piece. Umm, not only is this type of flexible plastic duct not to code just about anywhere in the US, but it is a fire hazard. The manufacturer knows this, of course, as they state to use rigid ducting. So, why include an unsafe and against code component at all? Lack of integrity, I would gather. Off to the big box store to get yet another part for this new piece-o-junk, this time rigid ducting in the correct diameter, and then...

The bar that holds the chimney cover was bent, and would not allow the sleeves to slide in correctly. After an hour of cursing and finagling, contractor and DH evidence to snip the sides of the sleeve to allow fitting. Eventually, it works, sort of. Whatever, we are over it t this point. We figure, pice of junk but now it's done! Turn it on! And!  Ummmm...

At full speed, a defeating roar I might add, this thing does not even cause a piece of paper to flutter directly underneath its vents. Completely and utterly useless. 600 cfm? My @ss.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
Arrived just as described. I can't wait until it gets installed in my new kitchen
I have been looking for a range hood every where and this was the best value
Available.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Control buttons are a little sticky and cheap but the hood finish is excellent and the price can't be beat!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Smaller than it looks but seems to work well and isn't terribly noisy.  Great light and great design.  And yes, great company service as others have said when we didn't understand something about a part - no perma hold, and knowledgeable rep.  Only weird thing is that you have to click the far left button to turn it on, THEN choose another button for how strong you want it (why not just push the 1/2/3/4 button?).  But hey it was a GREAT deal and SO nice to finally have a range hood after the tiny lame one that was in the wall before :)

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: nice and easy to install. would recommend this hood to anyone looking to buy a hood in this price range.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: The color and size is exactly as described and looks great in our newly remodeled kitchen.  Pairs great with Kitchen Aid Range.  Very quiet.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Scuff mark on the very front of it.  The contractor who installed it didn't scuff it.  It was like that when we got it, but didn't notice it until after the film was removed.  I didn't want to return it, because I didn't feel like removing it from my wall and send it back.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
We ordered our Hood the same time we did our Range and it is not installed but will be this next week. Very nice and a
great price we love this Stainless Steel hood. The one I have where I am living came from Europe and it is beautiful but
since were moving we wanted stainless steel and this sure fills the bill

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
Like:
 Noise level is acceptable. Much better than standard hoods.
 Moves plenty of air
 Half the cost of similar style/function products.
 Straight forward installation

Don't like:
  Razor sharp sheet metal edges. Will need to file edges so wife does not cut herself cleaning the baffles.

Recommendation: Buy

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: I love my hood - it is very well made,looks very expensive, and works really well. the 6 inch pipe is great because it takes out the smells of the kitchen quickly. The lights are great but the fan is a bit noisy on the highest setting but who cares when it does such a great job. Super fast delivery and really well packaged. I cannot believe how cheap this hood was, I have checked all the local stores and online and cannot find anything like this for the price.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: I didn't vent it outside, however the fan is very good and powerful.  It really circulates the air around well.  The product looks great in a kitchen and looks as though it cost more than it did.  I love this product in our new home!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: It looks good. The filters are easy to clean in dish washer. I would give 5 stars  if it is quieter.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: This range has the exact look and style I wanted at a fraction of the cost.  I was concerned that because the cost was so low the quality would lack but it doesn't.  Looks great and we receive many complements.  We also purchased the ductless vent charcoal filter and it works well.  Highly recommend!!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: We renovated our kitchen so it's somewhat traditional with stainless appliances.  This hood was a great addition!  It works well (vented inside with carbon filter inserts) and looks great.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: This is really beautiful, I needed a vent and fan so badly. My house was built in 1937 and never had a vent just a hole through the top of the room into the attic. I hated that anything I cooked stayed in the air for days, and days. This works so well! The lights are such a nice touch, It took some demo but its worth it. Oh and did I say it is really beautiful.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: This product looks very nice.when comparing it to others product,considering price, it is a good buy and no one will ever be the wiser. It vents great, the multiple speeds are helpful, and it is fairly quiet for a stove fan. However after installing and working for a few days the fan experienced an  electrical short where when you push the button for the light it doesn't come on.  didn't return it and just deal with it as the light does eventually come on the fan still functions normally.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
First, this is NOT the Professional Series product "Pro Series" as described.  Just look at the instruction manual to see that the product sent is not the Professional Series range hood as identified and described by the manufacturer in this manual.  Amazon is not selling the product it is claiming!  Or Amazon's supplier is not sending the product Amazon is describing!
Second, the directions for installation that come with the range hood are so abbreviated as to be almost worthless.  For example, there is nothing on making the electrical connections, which in my case required drilling holes in the frame and removing the internal power cord connections and reconnecting after reinserting the power cord from the non-plug end - not easy at all!
Next, just try to get the upper support bar located at the ceiling level and insert the screws - any Beta testing would make it obvious that this bar should be located lower on the wall with holes to match in the vented cover section.
Then consider that the provided plastic vent pipe is not designed to fit to standard 6" metal vent pipe or vent outlets - so it has to be scrapped and replaced with metal pipe which is very difficult to fit to the fan motor outlet.
These are a few of the frustrations I had with this product.
I have a lot of experience with building renovation, and while this vent is attractive and attractively priced, it is unnecessarily difficult to install.  It requires a significant independent learning curve, which I will probably never have to utilize again!
Once installed, the range hood works fine; but getting there is nightmarish - and I am no novice!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: I bought this hood (the 36 inch model) and it is horrible. It is made of very thin stainless. Several of the spot welds have broken and don't seal up the item causing it to suck air through the sides/top. The control panel on mine is broken. I would not buy this again. The vendor won't offer me any support for the popped spot welds and told me to take it to a machine shop to get rewelded.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Very easy to install.  Pretty quiet (especially compared to my old under-microwave model).  I would definitely recommend for anyone looking to redo their kitchen on a budget.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: I would have given it a 5 except I had a few minor complaints.  But overall it is good quality stainless which I tested with a magnet, looks professional like the much more expensive ones, was easy to install, the light is bright and it runs quietly and powerfully.  The surface was well protected and had no damage when it arrived, and the grills below are easy to remove for cleaning or changing the filters, but the latches are very sensitive so I think its possible to accidentally bump the latch at the front and have them fall out, but it hasn't happened yet.  My biggest complaint, which the instructions say nothing about, is the fact that you're expected to install an outlet behind the chimney; otherwise, there's no way to easily plug the cord in and get power, and no opening to get the cord out except by running up the chimney.  So you either have to cut a hole (difficult through stainless), run it up the chimney and try to hide it, or make sure you install an outlet behind the chimney first.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
I just replaced a "Euro Kitchens" brand hood with this one. The Euro is a similar product, inexpensive import. The switch panel started falling apart after a year, lighting transformer blew out twice, etc. No replacement parts available - so avoid that brand.

This unit, on the other hand, seems a bit nicer - it's much quieter (yes, you can chat with your spouse while cooking, even on high speed). It attached easily to the existing duct work. Only 2 screws hold it to the wall, and I would definitely worry about using the drywall anchors they supply - I'd think you really want some wood backing behind the drywall (and this thing's big enough that you could likely cut & patch some in, keeping the mess behind the unit and invisible).

It comes with wiring and parts diagrams and a plastic flex tube (I believe code calls for metal in many areas, but metal flex is cheap). It has similar soft-touch buttons to many other hoods and that would be my biggest worry, that those could fail on me again - but the three year warranty is nice.

They answered emails within 24 hours - and it got here in TWO DAYS for free - not bad!

CONS: this uses "baffle" style filters vs. the woven stainless you usually find in these things - so I'll be keeping an eye on internal grease buildup. I can't imagine those filter as well, but we'll see.

OVERALL: How can they sell & ship this for $299? If I get 4 years out of it I'll feel I got my money's worth.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: The hood was delivered earlier than I expected and was very well packed. It was very easy for me to mount by myself which took about 30 min. The fan is quieter than my previous unit and pushes a lot more air. It is the centerpiece of my new kitchen and I couldn't be happier about it.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: I love the way this thing looks in my kitchen, but it is REALLY loud. The light is wonderful, just wish that it didn't sound like an airplane.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Love the look at a great price.
Review_Text: Seems to be good quality. I put this fan into a rental. The hood gives the kitchen a high end look.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Had some questions before purchasing and the customer service came back to me with all the answers so gave me confidence to purchase it. Had a contractor install it as I have no experience with these devices and it works great. we vented it to the outside and the first few uses have been a success.  It is powerful and it looks very good,

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
The rangehood looks nice but does a bad job of getting rid of odors. There is no way the rangehood should be rated at 760 cfm on the highest setting.

Stay away from this product unless all you care about is the looks.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Great hood at an unbeatable price!
Review_Text: I had been looking for a ductless hood for our retro kitchen, and this fit the bill in every way! You can't beat the price and the quality is outstanding. It looks and acts better than many of the upscale models I have seen. It arrived boxed extremely well, and installation was quite easy. We weren't able to install an outlet behind the hood, and we just made a minor adjustment to let the cord hang out and plug into an existing outlet below it. It works just right for us, and we couldn't be more satisfied with this great hood. We find the lights to be perfect for our space, and it really shows off our retro stove. It has been a stellar performer in it's duties!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: This was well worth the purchase price.  Very nice, works well, easy to install.  No one can believe the price.  The only weird thing is when you go to shut it down from higher speeds, it is a 4 speed fan, so if you are on speed 3, to turn it off you have to push the 3, 2, and the 1 in order for the power to shut down.  You cannot simply push the power on and off.  Its pretty quiet and fit right into the spot we ordered it for.  We love it.  Nice lights underneath as well and you can re-direct them as needed.  We are using it as recirculating unit, so I can not attest to the pulling the smoke outside.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Great hood foor the price.  I put this hood in a kitchen of a house I hope to flip, and everyone has commented on how beautiful the kitchen is.  So the hood couldn't be bad.  It does a lot, and it was relatively inexpensive.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Great quality product with matching service
Review_Text: Easy to install, looks very nice over the range.  I did have one of the stainless stell filters with a broken thread for the screw to take it apart though.  They replaced it no questions asked with rush shipping.  I would definitely buy from them again!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: After much research, we decided on this product for our home. I read all the reviews (good and bad) and want to say that all the good reviews you read are TRUE!  The item was ordered on Thursday, it arrived THE VERY NEXT DAY!!!  I thought I'd have time to do final prep work over the weekend, but as it turned out, I installed the unit on Friday afternoon.  Very simple!  The best part of this product - IT ACTUALLY WORKS!!!  It is so very frustrating these days with manufactures cutting corners and dropping quality to make a dime.  I have NOTHING - NOTHING - NOTHING bad to say about this item.  The shipping was fast, the packing was awesome, the directions were easy, the install was fast and the unit WORKS.  OK,  with that said, I hope it continues to work,  but we had a dinner party on Sunday, made seafood pasta,  so had a huge pot of boiling water on the cooktop, scallops, shrimp, clams and mussles cooking in with cracked pepper bacon (OK, making myself hungry again).  But all that and the windows never showed any sign of fogging up, and there was NO oder anywhere it shouldn't be.  If your looking for a above average hood - BUY THIS UNIT!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
It is a quality fan and customer service is great.
The only reason that I didn't give it 5 stars is because it not really made to be a wall mount. As with a true wall mount fan the exhaust outlet exhausts out the back. This exhausts out the top and you will have to make some modifications to your existing duct work.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Best Price for a good Range Hood
Review_Text:
Ships in a well protected box, with the stainless steel faces covered in protective plastic. unpacks and installs very easily (took me less than an hour by myself). It should be noted that this unit comes with an outlet plug and therefore can either be plugged in to a previously installed outlet, or hard wired. The unit moves a lot of air and is not quiet at all on high, and moderately quiet on low. the lights are a nice touch and, though located in back, swivel forward to light up the range top.

Pros: looks great, easy to install, moves a lot of air

Cons: Chimney tower installs over range hood flange on top, leaving a small seam that, when using the unit as a ductless blower (with the charcoal filters) air is forced out and forward, right into your face. Of course, its better to vent outside, but until we install the vent, I had to put clear silicone along the seam to stop the air from coming out the front.

NOTE: When ordering the extension chimney for high ceilings, Z-Line replaces one of the 16" chimneys that comes with the unit (the non-slotted one) with a 36" piece. This is fine, but it is not clear that they do this and so basically you are paying $100 for 20 inches of stainless steel (36-16= 20)...

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Great look and style vent hood to match the kitchen.  Price was aslo a factor in the search for hoods.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
5 stars for the initial review.  Longevity is important for appliances...so we'll see how she does over the next months/years.  Overall, I'm extremely pleased with this hood.  For $300, it is what it is.  It's eye-candy.  Looks incredible and makes a huge statement.  But everything else about it is just kind of "chincy."  Not disappointed, as you have to expect that at this price point.  The buttons don't push down very easily/evenly, the wires are dangling loose in the inner fan (some of their 3M tape came loose), some of the baffles fit loosely thus creating a lopsided effect (a gentle bending corrected the situation) the supplied screws/anchors are a joke.  But hey, it looks incredible, and it does it's job...suck's the hot air.  And for that, I'm stoked to spend only $300 on this!  I've posted pictures for you to see....again, it looks awesome.  The packaging job was incredible.  And it comes coated with a protective film that protects the stainless finish until the final reveal.  It is a little hard to peel off the film on the chimney extension unit.  The other reviews said it scratches very easily...so I installed the chimney unit first, then peeled off the coating.  I had to use a razor blade to score it just below the sight-line on one of the chimney extensions for a "clean break."  Was a little nervous removing it from the box because some of the protective film had its own scratches.  I was worried those would transfer to the stainless steel.  Thankfully, they did not.  The noise is a non-issue.  It's a fan people...it's going to make noise.  On the highest setting, you need to raise your voice if you're standing directly by the hood trying to have a conversation.  But the other settings did not require my wife and I to "raise our voices."  It's fine.  Yes, all of the other reviewers are correct: buy new ductwork.  The supplied plastic ductwork is a joke.  It really is "easy" to install in that all you have to do is hang the thing.  Everything else is literally plug and play!

One more thought.  We have a 30" stove and I naturally was going to buy the 30" hood.  But right before my purchase, I started doing a little more research and many suggested to purchase a hood larger than your stove, to ensure it covers all of your burners.  So at the last second, I opted for the 36" hood.  SOOOOO glad I did.  Not only does it look better on the wall, it efficiently "sucks" regardless of what is cooking on any of the 4 burners.

Buy it.  It's worth it.  Let's just see how long it lasts......I'm cautiously optimistic.

UPDATE 4/25/2013:  After only our second time cleaning the stainless steel baffle filters, the screw/nut that holds the baffle together stripped, thus rendering it useless.  Obviously, we were pretty disappointed.  I sent an email to customer service asking what the next step of action should be.  They responded that same day with a tracking number and I had a new baffle in 2 days with no cost.  I've never experienced customer service like that.  Really, just outstanding.  I'm still worried that issues like this may arise again, but for the price-point, I have to expect that (one of the same screws on another baffle sits crooked in the baffle, causing it to align poorly).  My wife and I still love this hood...and after this customer service interaction, we're only more pleased with the purchase!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: I looked all over the net for an affordable ss vent hood and came upon this one on amazon. it had really good reviews and a great price, so i ordered it. It came quickly and arrived packaged very well. We finally installed it after we completed the backsplash installation, and it looks fabulous! It looks modern and sleek, and provides good under-hood lighting for our induction cooktop. I couldn't be happier!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: This range hood is just what we wanted.  It looks great and does a good job keeping our kitchen steam and odor free and the price was right.  Because our kitchen has a lower ceiling than normal we had to exchange the "chimney" for a custom made piece.  The company and their customer service department were very accommodating and efficient.  If only more companies operated like Z-line.  Their products and their service are amazing!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Title: Love this hood vent-especially for the price!
Review_Text: I am not one to write reviews, but seeing as I read them when researching products, I felt strongly enough about this vent to write one! We completely remodeled our kitchen about 6 months ago, and were shocked to see the ridiculous price tags on hood vents, which are basically just a small electric fan. Not to mention the fact that the big box stores didn't even carry hood vents that would provide enough air flow to remove odors and moisture from your kitchen on even the highest setting! I had my heart set on a nice wall mounted stainless vent with chimney, but was not about to pay over $1000 for something that barely vented. I am an avid cook and purchased a pretty high powered gas range, and needed something to really move air/moisture/heat out of our kitchen. Read the reviews on this one and thought for the money it was worth a shot. Probably one of my favorite appliances in the kitchen besides the new gas range! This vent looks really great, but better yet, will absolutely remove all the cooking odors and moisture out! I loved one review I read about this hood vent "sucking the hat off your head if you walked by"! It is true! I rarely use any setting other than low-even when boiling huge pots of water with tons of steam! Love that the baffles are removed easily and dishwasher safe. The lights get a bit hotter than I would like, but they light up the back of my stove really nicely for cooking. Some reviewers complained about lighting, but if you do your homework and are remodeling, the key to any kitchen is adding tons of lighting. A hood vent is not designed to light up your kitchen, but this one is perfect for lighting up the back of our stove as that area can be shadowy even with well placed overhead lighting. I would recommend ths vent highly to anyone who does lots of cooking, and wants a great product that will protect their home by actually removing moisture and odors. I do believe you can use this as a recirculating fan, but if you know anything about home building or maintenance, you would never install a recirculating vent that only moves the odors and moisture around your kitchen! Love this product! Looks great, moves tons of air. Didn't really come with instructions, but if you're somewhat handy, you'll figure it out quickly!

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Perfect!! We have had over 6 months and love it. Looks great in the kitchen and everyone compliments it. Like the rounded edges too.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: This is what I was looking for my kitchen. My wife was always reminding me of getting a new hood for our new kitchen. I have been postponing because I was not able to get a reasonable buy, most of the products I saw on the stores are around $500. Until I came across the Z line 36" Stainless Wall Mount Range Hood. This one is awesome it comes with a 4 speed touch sensitive electronic control and an LCD display. What was amazing was that the fan was so quiet we could hardly make out any noise. The stainless steel dishwasher safe baffle filters is an added advantage. The hood comes with a ductless option as well that is activated by charcoal filters.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Waiting to move in before I give it a full review, but I did take it out of the box to test it and it not only looks great but it moves a lot of air. Packaging was great and it looks nicer and more professional than units 2-3x the price. Can't wait to use it!

I had purchased this when moving into our new home in May 2012, however, with one thing or the another, it was actually December when we got down to installing it. Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Easy to install, no more cooking olor in the house, and look great for the price,  will recomend to medium size kitchen, litlle noisy

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text: Very good quality and nice looking installed. Installation was a more little difficult on my  sloped ceiling than it would be on a flat ceiling.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)
Review_Text:
We received the unit well packaged for shipping. No damage and all parts were intact. Installation is not for the novice in home repair. Ours required adding a brace between studs, some minor drywall work and relocation of an electrical box for power. The installation is straightforward and actually simple but again if there isn't an available cross brace, you will have to add it or contract the additional work. I would not recommend using expandable or drywall screw type mounts because of the weight and eventual vibration so a cross brace or stud mount is recommended. Additionally if you vent to the outside (which we did) you will have to cut a hole in the drywall, push aside any insulation and then provide a vent though the stucco to the outside. Total time doing this myself took about four hours (drywall cutout, stud mount, move electrical box and wiring, repair - texture- paint drywall, cut vent hole and stucco to the outside, install flapper vent and silicone seal it all - not bad for a basic homeowner based modification. Always measure twice and cut once.) Our hood  was an outside vent-type versus the recirculating charcoal filtered type.and the requisite tubing came with the vent.

 Once installed the system worked quite well and the lighting is excellent. It is an excellent compliment to our kitchen and really makes it "pop." I don't know if the CFMs are as advertised but the hood seems to clear the kitchen area of excess moisture and fumes just fine. Lots of compliments from family and friends and I would recommend this product to anyone interested.

Product_Name: ZLINE 36" Convertible Vent Wall Mount Range Hood in Stainless Steel (KB-36)

Review_Text: It is an very good product and its price is much lower than the other same quality product's in the market. Their after-sale service is very good. I will recommend this online store to my friends and relatives.
